code.captcha_invalid: Please validate that you are not a robot.
code.checkbox_invalid: You need to confirm that you accept the field as mandatory.
code.default: An unexpected error has occurred. If the error persists, contact an administrator.
code.email_inactive: This email is not yet active. Try resending the confirmation if you haven`t received it yet.
code.email_sent: Sending successfully. Please check your email. If you can`t find it, also check your spam folder.
code.field_invalid: The field value is not valid.
code.password_expired: Your password is expired. Please use the password reset button (Forgot your password?) to make the change.
code.register_done: Registration successful! Please check your email to activate your account. Also check your email spam folder, it may be there.
code.user_name_invalid: Attention: Special characters and bad words are not allowed as username.
